MoboConfiguration.description: Managed On Behalf Of configuration properties. This configuration exists for the resources where the Resource Provider manages some resources on behalf of the user.

MoboBrokerResource.description: Managed On Behalf Of broker resource. This resource is created by the Resource Provider to manage some resources on behalf of the user.
